condition.ab: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines have been preserved on the left and bottom sides only. Written with a medium pen in black ink which is badly faded in most places, perpendicular to the fibers on Recto. The top and right sides are broken off and there are many small worm holes in the papyrus.
